channel.description: Recent content in links on inkel

item.title: I have a newsletter now: inkelinks
item.description: One thing I like to do is collect links for reading later, and let’s be honest, who hasn’t? I also usually share some interesting links with folks at work, where I made myself the fame as the links provider. So that got me thinking: why not creating a newsletter where I can share these links with a broader audience? So thank you to Buttondown I now have a newsletter for you: inkelinks.
